messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pimping for Government School
messages.msgSnippet: ... Agreed.  So when homeschooling and/or unschooling associations start sending out the kids to fund-raise, then a complaint about it would be appropriate
messages.messageBody:
>This just in from a poster to NHEN-SpeakOut digest 1374
>
> > 'If door-to-door
> >sales are required to pay for what the adults deem necessary then the
> >adults, parents and teachers, should be out pounding the pavement,
> >not eight-year-olds.' <

Agreed. So when homeschooling and/or unschooling associations start
sending out the kids to fund-raise, then a complaint about it would be
appropriate here.
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
leschke@...
On Vancouver Island
